en-US.summary: The Show With No Name was a public access TV show that ran in Austin, Texas from 1995 through 2004. This skill presents some of the classic intros that started each episode.
examplePhrases: Alexa open the show with no name
Alexa ask the show with no name for an intro
Alexa tell the show with no name to start the show
en-US.name: The Show With No Name Intros
en-US.description: The Show With No Name was a public access TV show that ran in Austin, Texas from 1995 through 2004. This skill presents some of the classic intros that started each episode.
